author: @SGGROUP-sm3jl

text:
I have purchased from Bangalore two month before with 800 km drive.


Pls find only cons

1) front side suspension is very hard. You can find vibration in your hands heavily during hump cross...

2) front side box lock quality is very bad. Not able to open , close quickly.

3) display battery and KM value is not exactly match. Some issues are there is software . Warning message is coming.

4) reverse mode switch is bid hard.

5) side mirrors are very small. Not visible to backside vehicles . This will lead to frequent accidents.

6) if you park is slope area , there is no hill hold assistant... We need to press the brake always.. we always find up and slope roads in Bangalore road... It is must for heavy weight vehicles.

7) ride mode - max 85 km range only..

8) front led light is very dim . Not able to ride during the night..

9) many of the accessories are not available - out of stock always

10) back side suspension is very soft. So ground clearance is too low , if we ride with two ppl. Many time hit in off-road or any hump...
